name: ThatCowboyGame
description:
This game is made during the SaveOGL GameJam

That Cowboy Game is a local mobile partygame, where the players play as 4 outlaws of the Wild West trying to defeat a Sheriff - but there’s a twist. One of the players’ is the Deputy! It’s the players’ job to defeat the Sheriff and resolve the conflict that lies within. The game is played on one mobile device and the players take turns doing their actions. Target platform Android.

HOW TO PLAY

Don't show your personal screen to anyone else. Pass the device around, when the game tells you to. You can heal/attack other players, yourself and the Sheriff.  Change weapons from the INVENTORY -menu.
